subject: Compatible
description_text: I’m sorry but I must cancel my new order SSN6086 do to compatible issues that I was not aware of. I apologize for any inconvenience and will be canceling payment on my card as well if this is not passable. Thank you and hope you understand.

conversations.body_text: Will not be able to use product and need to cancel asap sorry for any trouble and thank you for all the help
Sorry getting mixed reviews atm and don’t want waste the money
Need to stop before shipping thank you
Have not got a reply and need to know the status. Thank very much.
Hello. Still have not got a relply I need to cancel my order asap. I do not want this shipped. Please stop order. thank you
I have made a claim with the bank at this time as well since I have not had any response in over 24 hr
Hi Alejandro Martinez,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your refund has been processed. Please check your account.

I have been refunded only for my first order but I have not been refunded only my second order 
Sent from my iPhone
